name: K.R.A.B.S.
description:
Killer Robotic Aquatic Battle Shockers

A competitive battle game for up to two players on the same mobile or tablet device.

Take control of your K.R.A.B.S. to collect more energy pellets than your opponent before time runs out. Use your missiles to attack and your shield to defend.

---

Level 6 Design Students

Rebecca Brannum - Programmer

Max Carter - Artist and Designer

Elliot Page - Designer and Musician

Original soundtrack track can be downloaded here: https://embersofthewillowtree.bandcamp.com/album/continuous
